com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.rest

Interface MessageConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GsonMessageConverter, JacksonMessageConverter, SimpleXmlMessageConverter

    public interface MessageConverter

    Converts RestResponse messages to objects.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 12/23/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T convert(java.lang.Class<T> clazz, RestResponse response)
      Reads an object of the given type form the given input message and returns it.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        <T> T convert(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
            RestResponse response)
        Reads an object of the given type form the given input message and returns it.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the type of the object to return
        response - the response to convert
        Returns:
        converted object
